COOKIE_TEST_MESSAGE.message: This is a test message about a cookie.
COOKIE_TEST_MESSAGE.description: A test message that is shown in a panel

NUM_LINES_TEST_MESSAGE.message: There {numLines, plural, =0 {are no lines} =1 {is one line} other {are # lines}}.
NUM_LINES_TEST_MESSAGE.description: A test message that is shown in a panel

TOOLTIP_MOVE_PANEL_LEFT.description: tooltip for moving the panel to the left

TOOLTIP_MOVE_PANEL_RIGHT.description: tooltip for moving the panel to the right

PLACEHOLDER_DEFINITIONS.message: Lookup a word to show definitions...

PLACEHOLDER_INFLECT_IN_PROGRESS.message: Lookup a word to show inflections...

PLACEHOLDER_INFLECT_UNAVAILABLE.description: placeholder for inflections panel if unavailable

LABEL_INFLECT_SELECT_POFS.description: label for part of speech selector on inflections panel

LABEL_INFLECT_SHOWFULL.description: label for expand button on inflections panel

LABEL_INFLECT_COLLAPSE.description: label for collapse table button on inflections panel

TOOLTIP_INFLECT_SHOWFULL.description: tooltip for show full table button on inflections panel

TOOLTIP_INFLECT_COLLAPSE.description: tooltip for collapse table button on inflections panel

LABEL_INFLECT_HIDEEMPTY.description: label for hide empty columns button on inflections panel

LABEL_INFLECT_SHOWEMPTY.description: label for show empty columns button on inflections panel

TOOLTIP_INFLECT_HIDEEMPTY.description: tooltip for hide empty columns button on inflections panel

TOOLTIP_INFLECT_SHOWEMPTY.description: tooltip for show empty columns button on inflections panel

INFLECT_MSG_TABLE_NOT_IMPLEMENTED.message: This table has not been implemented yet
INFLECT_MSG_TABLE_NOT_IMPLEMENTED.description: tooltip to show instead of inflection table if the latter is not implemented

INFLECT_MSG_TABLE_EXPANDED.message: This table shows all its columns. Click 'Collapse' to show the ones with matching endings only
INFLECT_MSG_TABLE_EXPANDED.description: a message shown for inflection tables that are expanded

INFLECT_MSG_TABLE_COLLAPSED.message: This table has been collapsed to show only columns with matching endings. Click 'Expand' to see the full table
INFLECT_MSG_TABLE_COLLAPSED.description: a message shown for inflection tables that are collapsed

INFLECT_MSG_TABLE_CANT_COLLAPSE.message: This table shows all its columns
INFLECT_MSG_TABLE_CANT_COLLAPSE.description: a message shown for inflection tables that cannot be collapsed or expanded

TEXT_INFO_ACTIVATE.message: Activate on a page with Latin, Ancient Greek, Arabic or Persian text.

TEXT_INFO_CLICK.message: Double-click on a word to retrieve morphology and short definitions.

TEXT_INFO_LANGDETECT.message: Alpheios will try to detect the language of the word from the page markup. If it cannot it will use the default language.

LABEL_INFO_CURRENTLANGUAGE.description: label for current language in info text

TEXT_INFO_SETTINGS.message: Click the Options wheel to change the default language, default dictionaries or to disable the popup (set UI Type to 'panel').

TEXT_INFO_ARROW.message: Use the arrow at the top of this panel to move it from the right to left of your browser window.

TEXT_INFO_REOPEN.message: You can reopen this panel at any time by selecting 'Info' from the Alpheios Reading Tools option in your browser's context menu.

TEXT_INFO_DEACTIVATE.message: Deactivate Alpheios by clicking the toolbar icon or choosing 'Deactivate' from the Alpheios Reading Tools option in your browser's context menu.

LABEL_POPUP_TREEBANK.description: label for treebank button on popup

LABEL_POPUP_INFLECT.description: label for inflect button on popup

LABEL_POPUP_OPTIONS.description: label for options button on popup

LABEL_POPUP_DEFINE.description: label for define button on popup

PLACEHOLDER_NO_LANGUAGE_POPUP_DATA.message: Lexical data couldn't be populated because page language is not defined
PLACEHOLDER_NO_LANGUAGE_POPUP_DATA.description: placeholder text for popup data when language is not defined

LABEL_POPUP_SHOWCREDITS.description: label for show credits link on popup

LABEL_POPUP_HIDECREDITS.description: label for hide credits link on popup

TEXT_NOTICE_GRAMMAR_NOTFOUND.message: The requested grammar resource is not currently available

TEXT_NOTICE_MORPHDATA_NOTFOUND.message: Morphological data not found. Definition queries pending.

TEXT_NOTICE_DEFSDATA_NOTFOUND.message: {requestType} request failed. Lemma not found for: "{word}"

LABEL_CTXTMENU_SENDEXP.description: send exp data context menu label

TOOLTIP_LOOKUP_BUTTON.description: Tooltip for the lookup button in lookup.vue

LABEL_LOOKUP_SETTINGS.description: Settings link-label in the lookup block in lookup.vue

TOOLTIP_RESKIN_LIGHTBG.description: Tooltip for light colors schema icon

TOOLTIP_RESKIN_DARKBG.description: Tooltip for dark colors schema icon

INFLECTIONS_CREDITS_TITLE.description: Title of credits section on inflection tables panel

INFLECTIONS_PARADIGMS_EXPLANATORY_HINT.message: The following table(s) show conjugation patterns for verbs which are similar to those of {word}
INFLECTIONS_PARADIGMS_EXPLANATORY_HINT.description: A hint that indicates that the current table is representative pattern for verbs similar to the one chosen

INFLECTIONS_MAIN_TABLE_LINK_TEXT.description: A link pointing to a main inflection table

INFL_ATTRIBUTE_LINK_TEXT_SOURCE.description: A link pointing to the source of a lemma or inflection
